source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of the Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute in Venice. The camera pulls back from a close-up of the basilica's dome and ornate facade. This movement reveals the grand steps leading up from the canal and two gondolas moored in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

generated_critique: The camera tilts down from a shot of the basilica's dome and ornate facade. As the camera moves, a group of tourists can be seen walking up the steps. This movement reveals the grand steps leading up from the canal and several gondolas moored in the foreground.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a scenic view of the Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute in Venice. The camera tilts down from the basilica's dome and ornate facade, revealing a group of tourists walking up the grand steps from the canal. Several gondolas are moored in the foreground, adding to the picturesque scene.
